function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Emerging issues related to jobs and income of millions of people, social safety net, future of income support schemes, the burden on women, and the plight of migrants and informal sector workers","Impact":"Potential increase in poverty and economic instability","Mitigation":"Implement effective income support and job creation schemes, strengthen social safety nets, provide support for women and migrants, and formalize informal sector work","Technologies":"Digital platforms for job creation, online financial support systems","People":"Millions of people, women, migrants, informal sector workers","Owner":"Government, international organizations"},{"Description":"Lack of access to resources and sudden disappearance of informal sectors of employment","Impact":"Loss of livelihoods and economic instability","Mitigation":"Provide access to resources, support informal sector workers, and facilitate economic recovery","Technologies":"Online marketplaces, digital financial systems","People":"Informal sector workers, individuals in affected industries","Owner":"Government, economic institutions, community organizations"},{"Description":"Developmental impacts on health, education, gender, economy, politics, and the environment","Impact":"Long-term imbalances in societies and communities","Mitigation":"Invest in health care, education, gender equality, economic recovery, and environmental sustainability","Technologies":"Telemedicine, e-learning platforms, sustainable industries","People":"Communities, individuals, marginalized groups","Owner":"Government, education institutions, healthcare organizations"}]}
